name: RouxnoBlue
description:
A random RPG, where you must save creatures from a psychopathic doctor


                                        -HISTORY-
Cat-mo is looking for a boy named Roux and his friends, Masumi and Marth, to save his race named Omi from an evil doctor, whose name is not known, or is he?

                                        -LEGEND-
In this world, there are hidden creatures.
Creatures which never came out of 'hidding'...
but...some did, and joined the humans.
...humans full of evil
...humans who just want their hidden power.

...but you are different.
..you are the legend who will save the Omi's World

                                   -OTHER LINKS-
